languages.text: {n}Старик тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Не нужно мне милосердия. Защити мою семью — а свою судьбу я вверяю тебе!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Старик тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Не нужно мне милосердия. Защити мою семью — а свою судьбу я вверяю тебе!"

languages.text: {n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"
languages.original_text: {n}Старик тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Не нужно мне милосердия. Защити мою семью — а свою судьбу я вверяю тебе!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own life, I place it in your hands!"
{n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own life, I place it in your hands!"
{n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"
{n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"
{n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"
{n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann seufzt schwer.{/n} "Ich brauche Eure Gnade nicht. Beschützt meine Familie — und was meine eigenes Schicksal angeht, das lege ich in Eure Hände!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann seufzt schwer.{/n} "Ich brauche Eure Gnade nicht. Beschützt meine Familie — und was meine eigenes Schicksal angeht, das lege ich in Eure Hände!"

languages.text: {n}Le vieillard pousse un profond soupir.{/n} « Je n'ai pas besoin de votre miséricorde, seulement que vous protégiez ma famille. Quant à mon sort, je le place entre vos mains ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieillard pousse un profond soupir.{/n} « Je n'ai pas besoin de votre miséricorde, seulement que vous protégiez ma famille. Quant à mon sort, je le place entre vos mains ! »

languages.text: {n}老人重重地叹了口气。{/n}“我不需要你的怜悯，请你保护我的家人吧。至于我自己的命运，由你来决定吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人重重地叹了口气。{/n}“我不需要你的怜悯，请你保护我的家人吧。至于我自己的命运，由你来决定吧！”

languages.text: {n}老人は重いため息をつく。{/n}「あなたの慈悲など必要ない。私の家族を守ってくれ。私自身の運命については、あなたの手に委ねた！」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は重いため息をつく。{/n}「あなたの慈悲など必要ない。私の家族を守ってくれ。私自身の運命については、あなたの手に委ねた！」

languages.text: {n}El anciano suspira profundamente.{/n} «No necesito tu misericordia. Protege a mi familia, y, en cuanto a mi propio destino, lo dejo en tus manos».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano suspira profundamente.{/n} «No necesito tu misericordia. Protege a mi familia, y, en cuanto a mi propio destino, lo dejo en tus manos».

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı adam derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Merhametini kendine sakla. Ailemi koru yeter. Kaderime gelirsek de senin ellerine bırakıyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sighs heavily.{/n} "I don't need your mercy. Protect my family — and as for my own fate, I place it in your hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı adam derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Merhametini kendine sakla. Ailemi koru yeter. Kaderime gelirsek de senin ellerine bırakıyorum!"
